sentences.english: One of the most popular plants at Christmas is the  poinsettia.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕中最流行的植物之一就是聖誕紅。

sentences.english: Comes with a glass of Mulled Wine or Eggnog or Hot Chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 包括一杯熱聖誕紅酒，雞蛋酒或者熱巧克力。

sentences.english: My family and I like to put poinsettias in our house at Christmastime.
sentences.chinese: 我和家人在聖誕節的時候喜歡在家裏放聖誕紅。

sentences.english: But I do like those poinsettias blooming in winter.
sentences.chinese: 可是我實在喜歡冬季開放的聖誕紅。

sentences.english: The colour of the Poinsettia is getting more and more varied.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕紅的顏色越來越多變化了。
